message: I'm curious what other people use when composing electronic music.  I am currently using a hardware sequencer driving a bunch of hardware synths, and I appreciate the limitations and focus it gives me.  I used to compose almost exclusively on the computer, but not anymore.  Do others find it easier on a computer?
I can only make things using FL Studio, anything else takes too much thinking and crushes my creativity.
Fascinating.  I find the capabilities of computers almost overwhelming in their flexibility, where I almost get choice paralysis.
